headline: How Recent Moves And AI Partnership Are Rewriting The Story For Man Group (LSE:EMG)
summary: Why the Man Group Fair Value Just Nudged Higher The fair value estimate for Man Group has been revised marginally to £2.75 from £2.76, driven by a small tweak to the underlying modelling rather than any single headline event. The latest work also trims the discount rate slightly to 8.41% from 8.47%, while keeping revenue growth and net margin assumptions effectively steady. This lines up with a cluster of research targets around £2.70 and reflects updated views on execution risk and...

headline: Big Bank CEOs received serious pay bumps in 2025
summary: CEOS from the biggest banks — JPMorgan Chase (JPM), Bank of America (BAC), Citigroup (C), Wells Fargo (WFC), Morgan Stanley (MS), and Goldman Sachs (GS) — all earned at least $40 million in 2025, their total pay increases rising by $45.3 million. Yahoo Finance Senior Bank Reporter David Hollerith examines these pay increases reported by major bank executives as the Trump administration lifted banking regulations last year. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Big Bank CEO pay surged by $45 million in 2025
summary: Big bank CEOs saw their 2025 compensation rise by a collective $45.3 million from the year before to $258 million, according to regulatory filings and Yahoo Finance’s tally.
